I18N - Class in de.eckhartarnold.client

I18NConstants - Interface in de.eckhartarnold.client

an array of the possible pixel sizes of the buttons
iconSets - Static variable in class de.eckhartarnold.client.ControlPanel
a map that contains for each possible pixel size of the buttons another map which maps the base name of the button to its image object
IMAGE_COLLECTION_DIR - Static variable in class de.eckhartarnold.client.GWTPhotoAlbum
name of the sub directory where the .json files describing the photo album reside.
ImageCollectionInfo - Interface in de.eckhartarnold.client
The interface ImageCollectionInfo is for querying the configuration data of the photo album.
ImageCollectionReader - Class in de.eckhartarnold.client
Reads the information about the image collection from a number of .json files.
ImageCollectionReader(String, ImageCollectionReader.ICallback, ImageCollectionReader.IMessage) - Constructor for class de.eckhartarnold.client.ImageCollectionReader
Reads the information about the image collection from several json files contained in the baseURL directory.
ImageCollectionReader.ICallback - Interface in de.eckhartarnold.client
This interface defines a call back function that is called with the ImageCollectionReader object as parameter.
ImageCollectionReader.IMessage - Interface in de.eckhartarnold.client
This interface defines a call back that receives a string message.
ImageCollectionReader.MessageDialog - Class in de.eckhartarnold.client
This is a helper class that allows displaying an error message in a dialog so that the user can be notified of any error that occurred during reading the configuration data from the .json files.
ImageCollectionReader.MessageDialog() - Constructor for class de.eckhartarnold.client.ImageCollectionReader.MessageDialog
